text: Hi Azad, it was good to meet you too. I don't think it was filmed and even though i could show you the slides, they are mainly just graphical and i was talking over them so prob would be no good. to be honest a lot it of may be what we've already spoken about. I talked about how i got into the industry and also showed a few clips from Happy and what we did on it. Also, just spoke a little about Union in general.
Hopefully some of the students can fill you in about what I spoke about - if they stayed awake for it :wink:

Fair enough :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing: yeah most of the stuff we talked about anyway, but yeah it was great seeing you! Currently I may not persue my compositing career yet because lidar lounge might be available but it's a 2 hour journey from home :sob:
